{../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_uparrow_cursoruparrow_cursor then l_x_hotspot := 0 l_y_hotspot := 5 when {../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_busy_cursorbusy_cursor then l_x_hotspot := 16 l_y_hotspot := 16 when
